Instance Method# initializeMemory(as:at:count:to:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
@discardableResult
func initializeMemory<T>(
    as type: T.Type,
    at offset: Int = 0,
    count: Int = 1,
    to repeatedValue: T
) -> UnsafeMutablePointer<T>
```
